name: Adaptive Program
description: Gain 10 bonus Shield from cards. Gain 3 Damage Boost whenever using a Shield card.

name: Arcane Protection
description: Take 5% less DMG per Buff on this Axie (capped at 20%).

name: Bloodlust
description: Non-Multihit Attacks Steal 15 HP. Multihit Attacks Steal 4 HP per hit.

name: Calcium Armor
description: Axie HP +30 At the beginning of your turn, gain Shield equal to 3% of max HP.

name: Celestial Might
description: Deal 5% more DMG per Buff on this Axie (capped at 20%).

name: Collect And Protect
description: In odd Rounds, draw 1 Additional Card when your turn starts. In even Rounds, gain 30 Shield when your turn starts.

name: Cursed Ritual
description: Attacks deal 3 bonus DMG per Curse Ability in your Deck (capped at 15 DMG).

name: Delayed Protection
description: When your turn starts, gain 12 Shield for each attack this Axie took in the previous turn.

name: Dominant Predator
description: Deal 20% more DMG against Bleeding Enemies Take 10% less DMG from Bleeding Enemies

name: Endless Anger
description: Gain 3 Rage when your turn starts. Each Rage grant 1 bonus DMG.

name: Energy Guru
description: Attack cards also deal 5 DMG per Energy Cost to all Enemies.

name: Feather Descend
description: When your turn starts, grant 2 Feather to your team.

name: Gaia's Embrace
description: Shield cards also restore HP equal to 100% of shield gained but grant 25% less shield.

name: Gloomy Dice
description: In Odd Rounds, apply Hex to all enemies for 2 turns at the start of your turn. In Even Rounds, apply Fear to all enemies for 2 turns at the start of your turn.

name: Healing Pulse
description: All teammates regen 8 HP when your turn ends. Increase healing card effects by 20%.

name: Heart of Ocean
description: Increase all Axies' max HP by 75.

name: Hearty Warrior
description: Axie max HP +30 Attack cards deal bonus DMG equal to 3% of remaining HP.

name: Heaven's Echoes
description: Your allies gain 1 Damage Boost whenever this Axie attacks. Your allies gain 8 Shield whenever this Axie uses a Skill.

name: Holy Prayer
description: Solo. When your turn starts, remove 1 Curse in your Deck. Heal all teammates for 30 HP when successfully removing a Curse.

name: Last Stand
description: When taking a fatal hit, survive with 1 HP until end of turn (active 1 time per battle). After that, apply an irremovable Heal Block.

name: Leftover Potion
description: Recover 4% of max HP at the end of your turn.

name: Malediction
description: Deal 10% more DMG against debuffed Enemies. Take 20% less DMG from debuffed Enemies

name: Mini Legion
description: Summoned units have +10 max HP. Deal +2 DMG per Summon to all Enemies at the beginning of your turn.

name: Miracle Leaf
description: Start Battle with 3 Leaf. Non-Multihit Attacks consume 1 Leaf and deal 15 bonus DMG

name: Pangolin Scale
description: Cannot gain Shield. Take 25% less DMG.

name: Poison Touch
description: Apply 1 Poison to Attacker. Take 20% less DMG from poisoned enemies.

name: Pure Instinct
description: All cards gain 15% Class Bonus.

name: Pure Power
description: Attack Abilities gain 15% Class Bonus.

name: Pure Skill
description: Heal and Shield Abilities gain 15% Class Bonus.

name: Raven's Tactic
description: Deal 20% bonus DMG if HP is above 50%. Take 20% less DMG if HP is below 50%.

name: Reckless Hunter
description: Deal 20% more DMG. Take 10% more DMG.

name: Regenerator
description: When your turn start, Cleanse 2 random debuffs if HP is full or recover 10% of max HP if HP isn't full.

name: Rise And Ruin
description: Add Forest Breath and Forest Wrath to your deck.

name: Shady Exchange
description: Solo. +1 energy on even numbered turns. Add 1 Daze, 1 Goo, 1 Void to your deck.

name: Shield Backup
description: This Axie's Shield isn't removed when your enemy's turn ends. Shield can absorb 50% more DMG.

name: Shield Leecher
description: When your turn starts, steal 50% Shield from the Enemy with the highest Shield.

name: Sturdy Fighter
description: Non-Multihit Attack cards deal bonus DMG equal to current Shield.

name: Thick Shield
description: Gain 10 bonus Shield from cards.

name: Tough Strike
description: Non Multihit Attack Abilities deal 10 bonus DMG.

name: Vault Builder
description: When your turn ends, gain Shield equal to (3 x the number of cards in your Discard Pile).

name: Venom Born
description: Poison on this Axie grants "Healing 1 HP per stack" instead of HP loss.

name: Venom Master
description: Attack cards apply 1 additional Poison. Non-Multihit Attacks deal 1 bonus DMG per 2 Poison on target.

name: Wicked Ward
description: Gain 15 Shield whenever you play a Curse card.

name: Zap Armor
description: Deal 20% more DMG if this Axie has Shield.
